subtitle.text: You know when the Mad Cow Disease came out?
Hmm the two cows were talking over the fence, like two old ladies.
And the one cow said to the other one...'Ohh, did you hear this Mad Cow Disease?'. 'They're killing some cows because they've got the disease.
'And oh I hope you know we don't get it.'. And the other one said, 'Ah don't worry'. 'I'm so glad I'm not a cow, I'm a rabbit.'
I'm a biggest; the biggest fan of my own bread.

target.desc: not dead, having great energy and enjoyment

subtitle.text: So when I work with the dough , it reminds me of when I was a kid

target.desc: a thick and soft mixture of flour and liquid used for baking into bread or pastry
